p: Shoyama et al. isolated cannabidivarinic acid (CBDVA, 52) from the benzene extract of Thai cannabis, which was chromatographed on a polyamide column eluted with H 2O:MeOH (1:1–1:6). Its structure was elucidated using UV, IR, and 1H NMR spectroscopic analysis [ 16]. Cannabidiorcol (CBD-C 1, 53) was identified in the hexane extract of Lebanese hashish by combined gas chromatography–mass spectrometry [ 39].
